programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 27
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: KING OF GENDANG TIBA TIBA NIKAH
programme.desc: Denny (Rendy Kjaernett), the drummer, suddenly has to marry Rina Diana due to urgent circumstances. Knowing that Denny has married without telling her, Denny's mother is furious. Moreover, Denny's mother doesn't like Tiwi (Rina Diana). Will Tiwi be able to win her mother-in-law's heart?

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 47
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Kesuntik Dokter Cinta Aku Gwenchana
programme.desc: Yuda's mother urged Yuda and Shasa to hurry up and get married, even though Shasa wasn't ready for it. Shasa suddenly went to Bandung for medical internship without informing Yuda's boyfriend first. It was there that Shasa met Rio, and they initially argued, but did they develop a love affair?

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 501
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: KETIKA SELAMET JADI TAJIR
programme.desc: No one believes that something that happens to us can actually be a blessing. That's what happened to Selamet (Dimas Aditya), a cleaning man at the office who was promoted to become a trusted aide to Rendra (Denny Martin), the boss.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 28
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: Ketoprak Spesial Cintanya Gak Ngakal
programme.desc: In his dream, a ketoprak seller is driving around and is nearly hit by a car driven by Devan (Kenny Austin), who looks just like him. The ketoprak seller is confused by his sudden wealth. Meanwhile, a female ketoprak seller is also confused by her sudden wealth.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 48
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Cinta Susu Murni Bukan Kaleng Kaleng
programme.desc: While delivering milk to a cow, Vira meets a boy named Gilang. The two argue because Gilang accidentally almost caused Vira an accident. To apologize, Gilang makes up for it by working on Vira's farm. The two grow closer, and without realizing it, Gilang turns out to be the childhood friend Vira has waited 15 years for and never returned.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 502
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Klik Riders - EP 25
programme.desc: Sebuah program untun tontonan semua.

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan bual bicara yang dihoskan oleh Dato' AC Mizal menjemput artis menaiki kereta 'Vintage' dan berbual menceritakan tentang kisah hidup mereka.

programme.title: Karoot Komedia - EP 2
programme.desc: Karoot Komedia adalah sebuah rancangan komedi muzikal 30 minit yang menggabungkan muzik, lakonan sketsa dengan topik-topik menarik yang akan dilakonkan secara spontan.

programme.title: Dahlia - EP 25
programme.desc: Dahlia memiliki segalanya, namun semuanya musnah akibat sikap khianat kawan baiknya sendiri yang ingin merampas semua miliknya termasuk suami, anak & harta.

programme.title: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak The Series - EP 20
programme.desc: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak The Series kisah tiga sekawan yang menemui congkak yang usang , Setelah itu, pelbagai kejadian aneh melanda kampung tersebut.

programme.title: Cik Reen Encik Ngok Ngek - EP 5
programme.desc: Azreen dan Harris terpaksa berkahwin apabila adik mereka melarikan diri pada malam sebelum bernikah. Adakah perkahwinan Harris dan Azreen akan berkekalan selepas Roadtrip Misadventures mereka?

programme.title: NoYa - EP 5
programme.desc: Noya bertujuan untuk mengambil semua kegilaan dan ketawa Aya dan Noreen telah diukir dan membawanya ke peringkat seterusnya.

programme.title: Destinasi Ke Destinasi - EP 10
programme.desc: Sebuah program menarik untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Makhluk Manis Dalam Bis - EP 10
programme.desc: Pertemuan pertama Emil dengan Gaby di dalam bas, seorang gadis manis misteri yang dia panggil Sweet Creatures. Sejak itu Emil berusaha mencari keberadaan Gaby, yang tinggal bersama datuknya.

programme.title: Fitness Battle - EP 3
programme.desc: Artis-artis tempatan akan bertarung dalam beberapa cabaran kecergasan yang akan menguji daya mental dan fizikal mereka.

programme.title: Muka Buku - EP 7
programme.desc: Muka Buku ialah rancangan permainan meneka, di mana selebriti perlu meneka antara empat peserta, siapa yang palsu dan siapa Muka Buku Sebenar

programme.desc: Kisah konflik Ifti Liyana yang terpaksa berdepan dengan cinta tiga lelaki iaitu Fredo, Bahkhtiar dan Nazmi.

programme.title: Generasi Gamerz - EP 5
programme.desc: Dua selebriti "Gamerz" akan bekerjasama dengan ibu atau bapa mereka untuk bertanding di dalam cabaran permainan video popular seperti Mobile Legends, FIFA20 & banyak lagi!

programme.title: Opocot Melatah Budak Pejabat - EP 7

programme.title: Tai Tai Berkecai - EP 8
programme.desc: Azlan Martins dikenali sebagai lelaki yang paling dihormati di negara ini. The Martins Ladies, isterinya, dan dua anak perempuan terkenal dengan gaya hidup mewah mereka.

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 60
programme.desc: Maria masih tidak berpuas hati dengan Arif. Eyra memulakan rancangan untuk mendapatkan seorang pembantu rumah buat Adellia dan Ian. Mak Pah terus menyiasat latarbelakang Maria

programme.title: Naluri Hati - EP 17
programme.desc: Pada hari perkahwinannya, Dinda teragak-agak kerana dia akan berkahwin dengan orang yang tidak dicintainya. Namun, satu kejadian berlaku dan menyebabkan Dinda mengalami amnesia separa.

programme.title: RASA Projek Gerenti Jadi - EP 1
programme.desc: Majalah masakan di Malaysia kini di kaca televisyen anda memaparkan resepi - resepi menarik setiap minggu yang dihoskan oleh Norzaini Abdul Halim (Aunty Aini) bersama - sama Adam Mahamed Ismail.

programme.title: Casa Impiana - EP 5
programme.desc: Program hiasan yang akan memaparkan keunikan dan keindahan rumah yang dibuat sendiri oleh pemiliknya. Tuan rumah berkongsi rahsia cara untuk mencantikkan rumah dari segi idea, petua dan citarasa peribadi.

programme.title: Pengantin Lelaki Untuk Cik Gadis - EP 19
programme.desc: Kecewa dengan impian untuk bergelar tentera, Kris al-Hadi ke ladang Tok Abah. Pertemuan dengan Salsabila, gadis malang yang difitnah hingga terpenjara telah menimbulkan rasa simpati dan cinta.

programme.title: Sesat - EP 10
programme.desc: Sesat, rancangan yang menguji minda dan ikhtiar hidup selebriti tempatan dalam mencari destinasi yang ditetapkan.

programme.title: 3 Campur 2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Kisah sebuah keluarga yang mempunyai lima adik beradik tiri. Ayahnya mempunyai tiga orang anak dan isteri baru mempunyai dua orang anak yang nakal. Timbul pelbagai konflik dan komedi dalam cerita ini.

programme.title: Roti Cicah Susu - EP 14
programme.desc: Empat orang anak yatim terpisah. Selepas 15 tahun, mereka bertemu semula dan cuba untuk mencari jawapan tentang apa yang berlaku sehingga membuka banyak rahsia yang tak sepatutnya diketahui.

programme.title: Lara Oh Lara! - EP 11
programme.desc: Lara Oh Lara membawakan kepada anda aksi lucu dan comel Lara Alana dalam kehidupan sehariannya. Dipenuhi gelak tawa dan kecomelan anak kepada pasangan Awal Asha'ari dan Scha Al-Yahya khas untuk anda

programme.title: Dee The Series - EP 1
programme.desc: Dee bersama adik dan ibunya Amy, memulakan hidup baru di KL apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia baru untuk Dee yang penuh dengan muzik, gelak ketawa dan air mata.

programme.title: Yuna Bintang Di Langit - EP 3
programme.desc: Ikuti Yuna meneruskan kerjayanya dalam bidang muzik di sekeliling Malaysia, Los Angeles & San Diego dengan kandungan eksklusif

programme.title: i-Tanggang - EP 5
programme.desc: Khalil teringat sewaktu dia membesar yang dia kerap sakit. Erma sering memberi dia pil biru dan juga merawat dia sendiri saja di rumah. Sementara itu, Syafiq terkejut dengan pengakuan Syuhada.

programme.title: i-Tanggang - EP 6
programme.desc: Dr Nini syak Erma menghidapi Munchausen Syndrome by Proxy. Khalil terjumpa garam & juga fail-fail hospital yang mencurigakan. Syafiq dan Esra terkejut apabila melihat Khalil boleh berjalan.

programme.title: i-Tanggang - EP 7
programme.desc: Erma mengunci Khalil di dalam bilik stor selepas mendapat tahu tentang persahabatannya dengan Esra dan Syafiq. Syafiq pula menerima panggilan telefon yang merisaukan dari rumahnya.

programme.title: i-Tanggang - EP 8
programme.desc: Harris meneruskan penyiasatannya & mendapati Erma mempunyai seorang kawan lama bernama Indah. Esra & Syafiq cuba selamatkan Khalil daripada Erma, namun tanpa sengaja tragedi berlaku.

programme.title: Carta 10 - EP 10
programme.desc: Hidup Ria yang mewah berubah sekelip mata. Demi mendapatkan harta, Ria bersubahat dengan seorang lelaki Cina iaitu Sean. Berjayakah Sean menolong Ria?

programme.title: Mat Dan Kaki Jalan - EP 11
programme.desc: Sebuah kisah travelog santai tentang perjalanan dan percutian seorang lelaki Inggeris Daniel Tayler atau dikenali sebagai Mat Dan berasal dari Cheltenham England ke Malaysia.

programme.title: Mini Me Bakes - EP 3
programme.desc: Rancangan memasak yang menampilkan selebriti Malaysia bersama anak-anak mereka di dapur, dengan citarasa Malaysia diselitkan resipi untuk diikuti oleh semua penonton.

programme.title: Fam ILY - EP 5
programme.desc: IniÂ kisahÂ keluargaÂ Shahir yangÂ merupakanÂ seorangÂ kontraktorÂ kelasÂ F bersamaÂ isterinyaÂ Marissa (suriÂ rumahÂ sepenuhÂ masa),Â anakÂ remajanyaÂ Qalisha danÂ anakÂ kecilnyaÂ Iman.

programme.title: Eropah, Here I Am
programme.desc: Bukhary membawa diri ke Pulau Leros, Greece dan menjadi sukarelawan membantu pelarian Syiria. Di situ dia mempelajari nilai kehidupan dan kemanusiaan.

programme.title: Geng Mak-Mak - EP 5
programme.desc: Geng Mak Mak menceritakan kisah seorang bakal ibu, Dahlia yang cuba belajar untuk menjadi seorang ibu yang terbaik untuk anaknya daripada 4 orang sahabat yang juga bergelar ibu.

programme.title: Roda Panas - EP 10

programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 32
programme.desc: Pierre-Charles discovers that Flavie looked up how to kiss on the Internet. Vic looks for someone to take him to a party.

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager - EP 4
programme.desc: At his grandfather's request, Kassa heads off on a mission to discover the culture and history of thirteen African countries.

programme.title: Bourvil, Le Rire Et La Tendresse - EP 1
programme.desc: Can you really become a star without being a ''loud mouth''? Absolutely, and Bourvil (1917-1970), born Andre Raimbourg, proves it. A self-taught artist from a modest background, right from childhood he was irresistibly drawn to the stage. Song, light opera, theatre, cinema, comedy sketches... We look back at his career.

programme.title: Bourvil, Le Rire Et La Tendresse - EP 2
programme.desc: Bourvil remains forever associated with the phenomenal success of Gerard Oury's films and his unforgettable partnership with Louis de Funes in ''The Sucker'' and ''Don't Look Now''. Possessing many other talents, he traversed the 20th century meeting the right people at the right time.

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France - EP 10
programme.desc: In the heart of Mafate, on Reunion Island, lies ilet a Bourse, a hamlet cut off from the rest of the world, from roads and from the hustle and bustle of urban life. Sophie, the local primary school teacher, runs a small class of just four pupils.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie - EP 6
programme.desc: Our trip to Latvia continues in the Gauja National Park, a veritable sanctuary of spectacular scenery, followed by a stopover at Rundale Castle, Latvia's Versailles. The tour ends in Liepaja, a vibrant port city, with French teacher Inga Bliska on a guided tour of the Great Amber Concert Hall.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: 'ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Les Nouveaux Boss - EP 3
programme.desc: The very first pan-African audiovisual competition for entrepreneurs. For eight weeks, sixteen candidates from all over Africa will be accompanied by four exceptional mentors as they develop their project: Claude Borna, A'Salfo, Nicole Sulu and Yassine Laghzioui. A number of celebrities will also come to talk about their experiences, including champion Teddy Riner.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Breaking down stereotypes, cliches and preconceived ideas, whatever the culture, nationality, sexual orientation, social background... Recounted by Magloire, through his story and the interwoven portraits of others, the series "Rassemblance" shows that integration is possible, that difference is an advantage for the common good, helping us to live together better.

programme.title: Carbone - EP 9
programme.desc: We are all worried about the climate, but we're still not doing enough to solve the problem. Is our psychology acting as a brake on climate action?

programme.title: Ensemble Pour Les Fetes Avec Corneille
programme.desc: In a chalet with an ultra-cozy atmosphere, Corneille invites two exceptional singers, Marie-Josee Lord and Dominique Fils-Aime, to join musicians Kepler Jean-Baptiste and Alexandre Paquette. Garlands, tree, fireplace: everything is set for a memorable moment of music, sharing, and storytelling.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La Grande Galerie Francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Jeux D'influence - EP 7
programme.desc: Anything goes when it comes to trying to stop Delpierre's parliamentary bill from progressing. Romain's murky past is used against him. Chloe is sectioned and held against her will in a specialist clinic for her so-called addiction. Claire is in danger and turns to Romain for help.

programme.title: Jeux D'influence - EP 8
programme.desc: Romain tells Delpierre he is resigning. Despite everything the latter is determined to make a major modification to his amendment in order to protect it. Bowman obliges Claire to sign a termination of contract together with a non-disclosure clause. The battle seems all but lost...

programme.title: Top 14 Rugby Le Mag - EP 12
programme.desc: Presenting the day's action in the Top 14, the French rugby championship, with summaries and highlights from the matches, players interviews and comments.

programme.title: Caroline Cherie
programme.desc: France, 1789. The Revolution is brewing. In order to ensure the safety of his daughter Caroline, the Comte de Bievres marries her to the sinister lawyer Georges Berthier, future member of the Convention. But the young woman understands nothing of politics and her heart belongs to another, Gaston de Sallanches.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 19
programme.desc: From the training grounds of La Masia, to Stamford Bridge - Marc Cucurella's journey to the top of World Football is a story of self belief and overcomiong adversity. One of the game's great character's - Cucurella grew up a Barcelona fan, and a graduate of their esteemed academy but only made one first team appearace for his childhood club.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 29
programme.desc: A firm favourite at Brighton and Hove Albion, Yankuba Minteh sits down with PL Stories and opens up on his journey from the streets of The Gambia to the pinnacle of the Premier League. We travel to his hometown to meet his parents and those who first recognised his talent, uncovering the roots of his relentless drive and humility. A story of resilience and rapid ascent, uncovering the challenges he's overcome, and the pride he carries for his home nation.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA JP Buys vs. Luthando Biko
programme.desc: This episode features a Bantamweight championship bout as current champion JP Buys faces off against interm champion Luthando Biko. Bonus coverage includes Shaun De Lange vs. Marcel Teniers and Wade Kerspuy vs. Josemar Octavio.

programme.title: WCCB Osleys Iglesias vs. Vladimir Shishkin
programme.desc: From the Montreal Casino in Canada, the undefeated IBO Super Middleweight Champion, Osleys Iglesias, looks to defend his title against top-ranked Vladimir Shishkin. The bout will also determine the mandatory challenger for the IBF World Championship in the division, currently held by Canelo Alvarez. Both fighters are ranked inside the top 5 according to several world rankings, with Iglesias ranked #3 and Shishkin #2 in the world by the IBF.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Bernard Hopkins vs. Jean Pascal
programme.desc: This episode features Bernard Hopkins taking on Jean Pascal in a light heavyweight title bout, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: Featuring Women's CMX Form and Weapons and Girl's Weapons at the ISKA US Open from Disney, Orlando, Florida, USA.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Sergio Martinez vs. Darren Barker
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a middleweight title fight between champion Sergio Martinez and up-and-coming European middleweight Darren Baker that ends with a right hook blast. Also on the card, action from 5-time champion Timothy Bradley.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Goeido, Abi, Kisenosato and Tochinoshin from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.desc: Episode 11: Bangkok, Thailand - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Muay Thai and Martial Art of Punches, Kicks, Elbows and Knees with Masters Thakoon Pongsupha and Karim Pattana.

programme.title: WCCB Sara Bailey vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: LIVE September 21st from the Hard Rock Casino in Ottawa, Canada, undefeated WBA Light Flyweight World Champion Sara Bailey of Ontario and IBF/WBO Light Flyweight World Champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina meet to unify the titles. Bailey claimed her title in just her fourth professional fight defeating Guadalupe Bautista, and Bermudez became a two-time champion when beating Tania Enriquez before two successful defenses.

programme.title: Saturday Encore Presentation Badou Jack vs. Norair Mikaeljan II
programme.desc: From Los Angeles, California, WBC Cruiserweight World Champion Badou Jack and top challenger Norair Mikaeljan meet in a hotly anticipated rematch, again with the World Title on the line. In their first meeting, Jack narrowly defeated Mikaeljan by the slimmest of margins, winning by one round on two of the judges' scorecards, while the third judge viewing the bout as a draw. In the rematch, both fighters will look to start the action early, with eyes on convincingly securing the championship.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: Highlights from the 26th Karate Senior World Championships as top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, all converged on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode follows former UFC welterweight champion Matt Serra around his hometown in New Jersey for a look at the lighter side of this intense competitor. Ring girl Natasha Wicks shows us that the fighters aren't the only ones with the big guns. Plus a behind the scenes look at the UFC Fan Expo and an interview with MMA legend Chael Sonnen.

programme.title: FS MMA Jorge Santiago vs. Trevor Prangley
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! A vicious knee to the body ends this fight inside the first round when Jorge Santiago fights Trevor Prangley in San Jose, CA, USA.

programme.title: WCCB Sara Bailey vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: LIVE September 21st from the Hard Rock Casino in Ottawa, Canada, undefeated WBA Light Flyweight World Champion Sara Bailey of Ontario and IBF/WBO Light Flyweight World Champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina meet to unify the titles. Bailey claimed her title in just her fourth professional fight defeating Guadalupe Bautista, and Bermudez became a two-time champion when beating Tania Enriquez before two successful defenses.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israel's fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: Featuring Team Form and Weapons at the ISKA US Open from Disney, Orlando, Florida, USA.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Ryan Rhodes
programme.desc: The main event in this episode sees Saul (Canelo) Alvarez making his first defense of the WBC light middleweight title, taking on challenger Ryan Rhodes. The bout ends in the final round after a series of unanswered blows. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Hakuho, Goeido, Kakuryu and Takayasu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: Highlights from the 26th Karate Senior World Championships as top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, all converged on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode follows former UFC welterweight champion Matt Serra around his hometown in New Jersey for a look at the lighter side of this intense competitor. Ring girl Natasha Wicks shows us that the fighters aren't the only ones with the big guns. Plus a behind the scenes look at the UFC Fan Expo and an interview with MMA legend Chael Sonnen.

programme.title: FS MMA Jorge Santiago vs. Trevor Prangley
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! A vicious knee to the body ends this fight inside the first round when Jorge Santiago fights Trevor Prangley in San Jose, CA, USA.

programme.title: WCCB Sara Bailey vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: LIVE September 21st from the Hard Rock Casino in Ottawa, Canada, undefeated WBA Light Flyweight World Champion Sara Bailey of Ontario and IBF/WBO Light Flyweight World Champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina meet to unify the titles. Bailey claimed her title in just her fourth professional fight defeating Guadalupe Bautista, and Bermudez became a two-time champion when beating Tania Enriquez before two successful defenses.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israel's fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts

He would get more than he bargained for against the young undefeated Fitzgerald, who gave Duran a more competitive fight than anyone could have expected.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: Supertato and the Tato Team must battle to save Tato Tower from Evil Pea's earth-shaking stomping performance at the Veg-O-Vision Song Contest.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 6
programme.desc: Supertato invites Evil Pea to his sleepover, but Carrot is suspicious and vows to stay up all night to make sure she can't unleash any of her evil plans.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 9
programme.desc: Supertato and the Veggies have built a super sandcastle, but Evil Pea wants to storm it by firing her hordes of Mini Peas at it with her pea shooter.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 10
programme.desc: The veggies are playing walkie-talkie hide-and-seek, but Evil Pea steals Carrot's walkie-talkie and uses it to trick the Veggies into getting trapped by the Corn Cobs.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 11
programme.desc: It's Evil Pea's birthday, but she and Carrot are trapped in the bottom of her freezer. They must put their differences aside and work together to escape.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 12
programme.desc: Evil Pea cheats Chilli out of winning floofy teddies at a funfair made from sweets, so Supertato and the Veggies must get the teddies back before it's too late!

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 13
programme.desc: Evil Pea creates an evil version of her nemesis, Supertato. With the help of her hench-Cobs, Evil Pea makes a big, green lumbering spud that she names Monstertato!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 56
programme.desc: Monty is avoiding taking a bath and wonders if you really need to get wet to get clean.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 25
programme.desc: JoJo, Gran Gran and Panda are helping Cynthia in her garden - JoJo loves how tall the sunflowers are. Cynthia gives JoJo a present of some sunflower seeds - JoJo can keep them ready to plant and grow more sunflowers next year.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 24
programme.desc: Great-Gran Gran shows JoJo an old family photo - it's fun spotting Gran Gran, Mummy and Great-Gran Gran when they were younger. JoJo recognises some people, but there are lots of members of her family that she's never met before.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 37
programme.desc: Sarah is inspired by listening to a poetry record and decides to make up some poetry of her own.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 36
programme.desc: A trip to the art gallery unexpectedly helps Duck with the hunt for his lost toy Rhino.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 17
programme.desc: Lorenzo decides to play a dangerous trick on his loyal coach Beppe.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 40
programme.desc: When Chloe tries to teach her dad to improvise and play Bluey's game of Octopus at home, he finds it hard to understand or enjoy, until they both realize they can play it their own way.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 41
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Dad always take out the bins. Over a few weeks, Bingo tells Dad about a new kid at kindy who is mean to her and Mum offers some good advice.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 42
programme.desc: When Muffin can't stop sucking her thumb, she has to wear a cone of shame. But the cone gets in her way and she can no longer play `sandwich shop' with Bluey and Bingo.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: Supertato and Broccoli go on a pirate adventure with Captain Pak Choi, but they don't realise she intends on plundering Evil Pea's freezer and stealing all her shiny things.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: Cartoon following four adventure-seeking superheroes as they explore exciting places all around the world.

programme.desc: Zahra-Rose's dish is Somalian nafaqo, made using mashed potato stuffed with boiled egg.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Andy encounters some baby Lar Gibbons in Thailand that appear to be flying as they swing through the rainforest.

programme.desc: Rori is building a castle with building blocks, which intrigues everyone.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: As Mum goes for a walk along the beach, Bluey runs to catch up with her. Along the way, she has a series of encounters that both excite and test her in her first solo adventure.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: While on a camping holiday, Bluey makes a new friend named called Jean-Luc. Bluey may not understand him, but they find a common language playing and hunting for a wild Daddy pig.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: A game of 'grannies' is fun, until Bluey and Bingo can't agree on one simple question: Can Grannies dance? Now they need to video call Nana to get the answer.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: Evil Pea blows all the lanterns away during the Lantern Festival. Supertato struggles to get them all back and needs Broccoli's help to save the day.

programme.desc: It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 32
programme.desc: Bluey is the ringmaster in a game of circus with her friends, but Hercules wants to play his motorcycle game instead. Luckily, Bluey has a solution to keep everyone happy.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 45
programme.desc: Mum helps Bluey and Bingo find ways to entertain themselves on a family road trip, while Dad tries to stay ahead of the grey nomad convoy or risk camping near the toilets.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 8
programme.desc: Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 15
programme.desc: While waiting to be picked up from school, Jack plays at being a sailor trying to find his way back home to Australia. Meanwhile, Jack's Dad has got lost on route to collect him.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 29
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo teach Unicorse good manners so he can ask Mum on a date, but things go awry when Unicorse eats a tick.

programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Samurai Drama Selections "The Way of Commerce: Gold and Silver 2" Ep. 1 (New) (R
programme.desc: The essence of trade lies in "joy for the buyer, happiness for the seller." Season 2 follows Sachi (Koshiba Fuka), who, after overcoming hardships and marrying the 6th heir Tomozo (Matsumoto Leo), faces new trials. As Isuzuya grows, she endures loss, defies convention to become its seventh female head, and boldly opens an Edo branch. With inventive ideas and strong bonds, she builds its foundation- a vibrant tale steeped in Japanâ€™s kimono culture, a heritage now captivating the world.

programme.title: The Wisdom of Japan's Gardens
programme.desc: We visit a Kyoto niwashi who designs gardens for temples and private homes and learn how he listens to nature to create gardens that evoke a natural landscape.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan: Izumo
programme.desc: A 140-year-old store sells delicate hand-crafted Japanese confectionery - traditional techniques present floral beauty in sweets, and the seasonal colours of Izumo are shown in time-lapse images.

programme.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Disaster training is advancing with digital technology. See how AR/VR technology is helping participants gain realistic experience about the movement of smoke in fires and the risks of a tsunami.

programme.title: Designer-Less Design
programme.desc: Graphic designer Kikuchi Atsuki is drawn to enamelware that reflects the creators' own instincts - he talks about the appeal of designs made and used by the same person.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: In the Wake of Agent Orange
programme.desc: The harm left in the wake of Agent Orange still impacts Vietnam's environment and its people. We follow filmmaker Masako Sakata who has spent two decades documenting the victims of this toxic legacy.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: J-Flicks

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream
programme.desc: Rehab Reimagined: From home-made activities to interactive digital technology, this episode focuses on different approaches to physical therapy.

programme.title: Let's Enjoy Maths
programme.desc: Children wish to share a cake but are confused when Numbler cuts the cake into different shapes - Barky uses the basics of fractions and geometry to prove that the pieces are indeed equal.

programme.title: Take Tech
programme.desc: A programme for upper primary to lower secondary school children about exploring everyday technologies all around them - each episode takes a piece of familiar tech and finds out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: Down an old street in Yokohama is a shoe repair shop with requests from around the world - the artisan happily accepts shoes other shops refuse. A story unfolds around a pair of shoes and their owner.

programme.title: Dining with the Chef mini
programme.desc: Featured recipe: Chicken Thigh Kara-age. Learn about easy, delicious, and healthy cooking in five minutes with Chef Rika!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Sake Truth
programme.desc: We explore various truths about sake from the koji that determines the taste to medieval innovations that changed sake-making. We also examine the science behind why sake changes flavour when heated.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture - this episode looks at words related to mouths. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Higashinada Danjiri involves a parade of decorated floats pulled by teams of veterans and ridden by young performers that lean out over the crowd - 32 districts take part with their own float.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This time: Hamaura Ayano (a former Hello! Project artist who moved into acting and is now a solo singer) and BUDDiiS, a dance-and-vocal group with 10 unique members.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: An animated series about a Japanese dog who gets lost in New York City. Charo says 'I want to see my owner again!', and so he starts his adventure to find his way back home.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japan has nine million vacant homes - we investigate the issue of vacant homes in Japan and see how they're being used creatively to promote population growth and regional revitalisation.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Chichibu is a mountainous region with lots of natural beauty; cats keep watch over a field of red spider lilies and even guide visitors through the mountains! We also meet a cat who lives at a shrine.

programme.title: Anime Manga Explosion
programme.desc: How did DIGIMON grow from a simple handheld game into a dramatic anime across 25 years? Meet the creators and go behind the scenes of their latest project DIGIMON BEATBREAK.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy - with the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.desc: Takasago Masami generates almost no plastic waste composting instead of plastic bags for food scraps or doing dishes with a cloth instead of a disposable sponge - little ideas that are fun and easy.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: OMG, Your Honour - EP 13
programme.desc: Two distinguished criminal barristers, Fan Siu Yu and Yiu Lik Hung, have been rivals since law school. Despite being classmates, their personalities and approaches to law are very different, leading to years of personal and professional conflict.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian & What's On Today - EP 4
programme.desc: Legendary Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho Fai, known for his role as one of the Three Tigers, faces a dramatic fall from grace after a failed mission. Joining the Special Duties Unit, he and his team fight to uncover and thwart a plot against Hong Kongâ€˜s financial system.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2706
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

programme.title: Court Lady - EP 22
programme.desc: Sheng Chumu, son of General Sheng Xiaojing, falls in love with Fu Rou, the daughter of an embroidery merchant. Having confirmed their feelings, the two return to Chang'an. Fu Rou soon becomes a female official, and Sheng Chumu is forced to join the army.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: This show brings on doctors and Chinese medicine practitioners to discuss diseases that the elderly should pay attention to, and provide prevention and treatment methods.

programme.title: Tastebuds Pamper Top 100 Delicacy Restro
programme.desc: The show takes you to visit restaurants and shops that may not be mentioned in travel guides or are not particularly noticeable. In addition to discovering hidden gems, our food experts will also share their personal tips for enjoying the dishes.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Good Morning Hong Kong
programme.desc: Good Morning Hong Kong brings you the latest news about Hong Kong, cross-strait, and international affairs that matter to you.

programme.title: OMG, Your Honour - EP 14
programme.desc: Two distinguished criminal barristers, Fan Siu Yu and Yiu Lik Hung, have been rivals since law school. Despite being classmates, their personalities and approaches to law are very different, leading to years of personal and professional conflict.

programme.title: Clash Of Home Chefs
programme.desc: Home-cooked meals may seem ordinary, but they're also economical, enjoyable and delicious, thanks to the skill of one's cooking. Fourteen contestants present their own unique recipes, which are then reviewed by our hosts, judges and celebrity guests!

programme.title: Hands Up

They go through all the important milestones in life together, always supporting one another as they study, work, and pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Love's Ambition - EP 1
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] TV host Xu Yan (Zhao Lusi) and urban elite Shen Haoming (William Chan) appear to have a perfect marriage, but it is riddled with secrets. Eventually, they shed their facades, grow closer again, and rediscover themselves.

programme.title: I Kill U - EP 3
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Sun Woo, a down-and-out former athlete, is hired to impersonate Ji Yeon, an heiress involved as a driver in a hit-and-run accident. Drawn into dangerous family power struggles, she is trapped between survival and deception.

programme.title: Good Job - EP 5
programme.desc: Eun Seon-Woo (Jung Il-Woo) owns the biggest company in Korea and secretly runs a private detective office. Don Se-Ra (Kwon Yuri) was born with hyperacuity and uses it to help people. As the arrogant and the helpful meet to solve cases together, romance blossoms.

programme.title: Ye Cheng - EP 9
programme.desc: Shu Cheng (Claire Jia), the daughter of the first aristocratic family, pretends to be a playgirl to conceal her identify. While promoting Shen Ye (Yuan Hao) as a courtesan, she discovers his multiple identities. They have no choice but to work together.

programme.title: Destined - EP 40
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant whoâ€™s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Lost You Forever Season 1 - EP 1
programme.desc: A drama of mythical ancient times starring Yang Zi and Zhang Wanyi. The drama is adapted from novel titled Miss You Forever by the writer, Tonghua. It tells the story of love and hatred between Xiaoyao and Qiangxuan, Tu Shanjing, Chishui Fenglong and Xiangliu.

programme.title: Shadow Love - EP 1
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The story follows Li Shuang (played by Song Yi), the adopted daughter of a great general guarding the borders of the Great Jin, and Jin An (played by Cheng Lei), the heir of Western Rong. The two join forces to root out a traitor, resolve a national crisis, and gradually fall in love.

programme.title: Ms Incognito - EP 1
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] A bodyguard hides in a village as a kindergarten teacher to avoid her boss' enemies â€“ but faces a new challenge in a skeptical strawberry farmer!

programme.title: Good Job - EP 6
programme.desc: Eun Seon-Woo (Jung Il-Woo) owns the biggest company in Korea and secretly runs a private detective office. Don Se-Ra (Kwon Yuri) was born with hyperacuity and uses it to help people. As the arrogant and the helpful meet to solve cases together, romance blossoms.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 25
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a â€˜Fire masterâ€™ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHINGâ€™s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 14
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 10
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 11
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LIâ€™s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 28
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60â€™s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 16
programme.desc: Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai joins forces with many friends in the entertainment industry to star in the TVB drama "Good Morning Sir," playing a passionate and energetic young teacher who experiences unique challenges in school, family, and relationships.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 9
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 27
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 28
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. programme.title: Defected, The - EP 17
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong's toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husband's love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: Adapted from an award-winning Chinese novel, the story follows the life of a legendary Shanghai beauty Wang Qi Yao from her glamorous to her simpler days. She stays true to her own way of life while surviving the constant betrayal of her men, and bears witness to the waves of change to her city from 1947 to 1981.

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: Wei Xiao Bao is sent by a revolutionary group to be a spy in the imperial palace and find "The Sutra of 42 Chapters". Xiao Bao soon befriends Emperor Kang Xi but must carry out his mission at the same time, so he is caught between two camps.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon II
programme.desc: This is a sequel to "Casino Tycoon". 20 years after Benny Ho established his casino empire in Macau, his former partner becomes envious and plots to bring him down. At the same time, a young man working for Benny is the son of his ex-lover, and is also out to take revenge on him. Ho however, is not about to take things lying down...

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Rob-B-Hood
programme.desc: The famous "Gang Trio" is hired to kidnap a baby for 30 million dollars. When they realize that the triad is after both the ransom and the baby's life, they decide to make the hostage their protege. Cornered by cops and threatened by gangsters, the three 'Rob-B-Hood' must put the baby safely back in his cradle.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: 36 Secrets of Courtship
programme.desc: This erotic comedy features three lotharios who vie to become principal of the Macho Man Training School -- an extremely sexy institution dedicated to extremely non Shaolin-types of physical exertion.

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father's underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau's economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jin's pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wife's death.

programme.title: Women
programme.desc: Bo Yi's husband is having an affair, so Bo Yi divorces him and joins the "Happy Spinsters Club" set up by her friends. However, she soon finds out that she does not enjoy being single and while sorting out her thoughts, her repentant husband begs her forgiveness. She must now decide on what she truly wants.

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Li's daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: A delivery boy Yin wants to impress his dream girl Li, so he enrols in a martial arts course to learn strange moves. Being timid, Yin saves Li while wearing a Garfield mask but the credit is stolen by Karate Master, Liu. To prove himself and win Li back, Yin defeats Liu in the ring with his unique martial arts move "Invincible Wind and Fire Spin".

programme.title: Man Wanted 3
programme.desc: Street kid Dong idolizes Mongkok triad leader Pu Jun and inadvertently joins his gang. When rival Xi Yang seizes control by illicit means, Pu Jun decides to take him down. At the same time, Pu Jun uncovers Dong as a police undercover and banishes him, but Dong sheds his undercover identity to join Pu Jun to seek revenge against Xi Yang.

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: After being betrayed by Zhuo, the white-haired witch Lian seeks revenge by slaughtering her way through the eight martial arts clans. However, she is soon attacked by a man whose bride she has abducted. Meanwhile, Zhuo, who is waiting on a hilltop for a flower to bloom for Lian's restoration, hastens to save her upon realizing the danger she is in.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Mr Vampire III
programme.desc: Taoist conman Ming fails to banish vengeful spirits and escapes with his ghostly companions. As they seek refuge in a village, they encounter an evil witch whose goal is to eliminate the human race. Ming then allies with Taoist priest Master Jiu to battle the witch-but can they prevail against such overwhelming darkness?

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband's playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Lo's brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hu's house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hu's pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: After avenging his father's death by assassinating a high official, Li Yue disappears into hiding as a fugitive. His fiancee enlists a swordsman-who secretly loves her-to search for him, unaware that the bandit Xiao Mei has also fallen for Li Yue. Their intertwined love quadrangle explores themes of sacrifice, devotion and selfless love.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father's towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the government's secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperor's ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Long's wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident...

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her...

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chun's plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the "Tsai Li Fu" style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn's beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong's concubine as he knows Dong's adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrate's daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: This supernatural mystery tells the story of a sickly wife and her maid conspiring to kill her beastly husband, leading to a string of events with spooky twists and turns.

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the "speed gang", led by Johnny, and Kuo's sister Carrie is molested by Johnny's brother Michael. Kuo's family continues to be harassed by the "speed gang" while on the island - can Kuo protect them?

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu skill from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in a fight between the Qing and Ming camps along the way, and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon's pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister's wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fiance, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fiance Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan...

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past ten years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor's death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money! Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. Those who won goes to the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Global Focus
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: 2025 New Taipei City All Stars Xmas Concert
programme.desc: The "2025 New Taipei City A Stars Xmas Concert" is set for a grand debut! Hosted by the trio of Tseng Tzu-yu, Hank Chen, and Dora Hsieh, over a dozen acts will light up this dazzling winter night. Mixer and Accusefive will kick off the show with high energy, while WeiBird and Power Station will serve as the grand finale, rocking the crowd with heartwarming vocals and electrifying performances.

programme.title: Super Taste: Go Bananas! Corp.
